title: Newly identified stem cells can lure breast cancer to the spine
description: A new type of stem cell discovered in mice and humans might explain why cancer that spreads to other body parts preferentially targets the spine.

title: The black hole–powered jet in galaxy M87 is making stars explode
description: Hubble Space Telescope data show a surprising number of nova blasts along the jet of high-speed gas coming from the galaxy M87.

title: In a first, genetically modified silkworms produced pure spider silk
description: An effort to engineer silkworms to produce spider silk brings us closer than ever to exploiting the extraordinary properties of this arachnid fiber.
